summary: This document is an email correspondence discussing financial matters related to Southern Financial and a meeting with an individual referred to as JE. The email involves multiple parties coordinating on asset management and exposure related to financial positions.

persons.name: Tazia Smith
persons.context: Tazia Smith is identified as the Director of Key Client Partners at Deutsche Bank Securities Inc, involved in discussions about financial positions.
